properties.name: 7A
properties.description: Posted by Diegoclau7th st and Avenue A new yorkLove this East Village place for brunch. There\'s a 0 brunch menu that includes coffee, a cocktail, and food. They have several outstanding varieties of eggs benedict, and an amazing breakfast burrito. There\'s always a wait on Sundays at brunch time. They\'re also open 24 hours.

properties.name: DT-UT
properties.description: Posted by Diegoclau    1626 2nd Avenue, New York, NY 10028A cool and unusual Cafe, DT-UT offers a wonderful gathering place for the stroller set and for parents with young children. The long, deep space, with vintage overstuffed armchairs and sofas pushed back against the walls or in open clusters, offers plenty of room to manoeuver strollers or for toddlers to move around. The style might be described as a cross between your living room and the set for a Cocteau movie. (GoCityKids)

properties.name: Rue B
properties.description: Posted by Diegoclau12th street and avenue B, new york, NYRue B is our favorite brunch deal in New York! Funky atmosphere, delicious food, great value on brunch. Truffled eggs and eggs Corleone are two of our favorites. On Sundays, we get the extra treat of spotting the same two beautiful Australian models.
